project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program to read a text file, count the frequency of each word, and display the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement file reading functionality to read the text file
Implement word counting logic using a dictionary
Sort the word counts and extract the top 10 most common words
Implement functionality to display the results in the terminal
Write tests for the file reading functionality and word counting functionality
Execute tests to ensure that the program functions correctly
